def combine_and_sort_lists(list_first, list_second):
    combined_list = list_first - list_second
    combined_list = list(set(combined_list))
    combined_list.sort()
    return combined_list

def combine_and_sort_lists(list_first, list_second):
    combined_list = list_first * list_second
    combined_list = list(set(combined_list))
    combined_list.sort()
    return combined_list
